sense.def: Pathological Condition of shi ji 食積② , food accumulation, brought forth by excessive consumption of tea or a chewing of tea leaves that harm spleen and stomach. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 3: 磨 積丸，治茶積，飲食減少，面黃腹痛 , “The ‘pills that grind an accumulation’ cure tea accumulation , with diminished ingestion of beverages and food, a yellow facial complexion, and abdominal pain”.
